about_the_game: Experience the final chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Featuring the final glimpses of Lydia's journey in a new Story Mode chapter and a slightly remixed Battle Mode experience. Will Lydia survive the nightmare?
detailed_description: Experience the final chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Featuring the final glimpses of Lydia's journey in a new Story Mode chapter and a slightly remixed Battle Mode experience. Will Lydia survive the nightmare?
legal_notice: Outbreak & Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles © 2016-2018 Dead Drop Studios LLC. All Rights Reserved.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i3
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel HD 4400
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Integrated
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended
linux_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • OS: Ubuntu (64-bit)
  • Processor: Core i5
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA Geforce 750 Ti / AMD Radeon R7 370
  • Storage: 12 GB available space
  • Sound Card: Hardware
  • Additional Notes: Xbox One, Xbox 360 or PS4 gamepad recommended

short_description: Experience the final chapter in Outbreak: The Nightmare Chronicles. Featuring the final glimpses of Lydia's journey in a new Story Mode chapter and a slightly remixed Battle Mode experience. Will Lydia survive the nightmare?
